Normal wolves always hunt at maximum intensity (theta=1), but you can choose differently.

explanations: I chose this theta because the increase in the wolf population suggests more competition for food. By lowering my hunting intensity to 0.60, I can conserve energy while still contributing to the pack

I chose this theta because the number of sheep has decreased, making hunting less rewarding. With more wolves around, a lower intensity allows me to conserve energy while still contributing to the pack

This balance helps ensure my survival in a competitive situation with other wolves.
